A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as bad as many are saying\, nor as good. It's a fun 2.4 hour distraction\, but has many writing and characterization issues. It's almost like Rian Johnson ignored TFA (and much of Star Wars lore) and just did what the wanted to do. Some of it works...some of it sits sour with many fans (Luke's entire characterization\, pointless Rose on their pointless mission\, space Leia\, etc). Still more fun to watch than much of the stuff tossed into theaters these days.
